page.title: 08Children's food in Marnhull.
page.content: BREAKFAST-All the class have some kind of cereal and tea or coffee.Most have toast.10% have cooked breakfast. LUNCH-Dorset Education Committee do not provide cooked meals so children bring a packed lunch.90% of the children have flavoured potato crisps in a plastic bag.All bring sandwiches made of cut bread with various fillings.All have a chocolate biscuit or cake.Most eat fruit as well. To drink,about 20% buy 1/3pt of milk which is subsidized by the EEC.Others bring fruit squash made from cordial. EVENING MEAL-All have a hot cooked meal comprising potato,meat or fish. Only a few have fruit or pudding. SUPPER-Most have a hot drink with biscuits,some have cereal and a few have nothing at all. At WEEKENDS almost 100% have a roast Sunday dinner.
